Selections¶

class mira.core.Selection(points)[source]¶

Defines a selection within an image.

Parameters:points – A list of points defining the selection.
area()[source]¶

Compute the area of the selection.

Return type:float
assign_keypoints(keypoints)[source]¶

Obtain a revised version of the selection with the given keypoints

Return type:Selection
bbox()[source]¶

The simple bounding box containing the selection.

Returns:The coordinates (x1, y1, x2, y2). The first set always correspond with the top left of the image. The second set always correspond with the bottom right of the image.
Return type:Tuple[int, int, int, int]
contains_point(other)[source]¶

Determine whether this selection contains a particular point.

Parameters:other – An iterable describing a point (x, y)
Returns:A bool, True if other is contained within selection, False otherwise.
Return type:bool
contains_points(other)[source]¶

Determine whether this selection contains a series of points.

Parameters:other – A numpy array of shape (N, 2)
Returns:A numpy array of shape (N, ), describing whether or not the point at that position was in the selection.
crop(width, height)[source]¶

Crop a selection to a given image width and height.

Parameters:
  • width – The width of the image
  • height – The height of the image
draw(image, color)[source]¶

Draw selection onto given image.

Parameters:
  • image – The image to draw on.
  • color – The color to use.
Returns:

The image with the selection drawn
Return type:

Image
keypoints()[source]¶

Obtain a list of keypoints for the selection.

Returns:A list of keypoints
Return type:List[Keypoint]
rbox()[source]¶

Obtain the parameters of a rotated box.

Returns:The vertices of the rotated box in top-left, top-right, bottom-right, bottom-left order along with the angle of rotation about the bottom left corner.
Return type:Tuple[Tuple[float, float], Tuple[float, float], Tuple[float, float], Tuple[float, float], float]
resize(scale)[source]¶

Obtain a revised selection with a given uniform scaling.

Return type:Selection
